verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. LORD <S%H3068><s%>, who shall abide <S%H1481><s%> in thy tabernacle <S%H168><s%>? who shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in thy holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>? abide: Heb. sojourn
He that walketh <S%H1980><s%> uprightly <S%H8549><s%>, and worketh <S%H6466><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and speaketh <S%H1696><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> in his heart <S%H3824><s%>.

He that backbiteth <S%H7270><s%> not with his tongue <S%H3956><s%>, nor doeth <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, nor taketh up <S%H5375><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> against his neighbour <S%H7138><s%>. taketh: or, receiveth, or, endureth

In whose eyes <S%H5869><s%> a vile person <S%H3988><s%> is contemned <S%H959><s%>; but he honoureth <S%H3513><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. He that sweareth <S%H7650><s%> to his own hurt <S%H7489><s%>, and changeth <S%H4171><s%> not.

He that putteth not out <S%H5414><s%> his money <S%H3701><s%> to usury <S%H5392><s%>, nor taketh <S%H3947><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%> against the innocent <S%H5355><s%>. He that doeth <S%H6213><s%> these things shall never <S%H5769><s%> be moved <S%H4131><s%>.
